REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2120 reute r f BC-CHRIS-CRAFT-INDUSTRIE 03-26 0060

TEXT.TITLE: CHRIS-CRAFT INDUSTRIES INC <CCN> REGULAR PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Chris-Craft Industies Inc said it declared a regular two pct stock dividend on both its common stock and class B common stock, which is equal the two pct stock dividends the company paid for the prior quarter. The dividends are payable on April 20 to shareholders of record April six. Reuter
